title: Texas Infomedia
content:
## Heading 2

At Texas Infomedia, we are definitly human.

Claims that we are reptilian infiltrators are filthy mammal lies.

### Heading 3

#### [](https://google.com)Images

Images in a paragraph should look good. 

![hrose](/images/uploads/hrose.jpg)

I am some other info, don't mind me just here for testing porpoises. We are trying to get them to steal things from scuba divers. Pictured: A very sick porpoise.

![Porpoise built purpose rack](/images/uploads/eqprck.jpg)

featurecards.headline: We Are Remodeling
featurecards.blurb: A clean new look, and streamlined experience is coming to TexasInfomedia.com.
